actions.name: Tenebrous Typhoon

cost.trigger: User's partner uses Z-Pose! and triggers the appropriate Z-Power-Crystal.

actions.description:
Trigger: User's partner uses Z-Pose! and triggers the appropriate Z-Power-Crystal.

Effect: On hit, all valid targets lose -1 EVA Stage for 5 Activations.

Requirement: Requirement: [Lugia] Z-Power-Crystal as an Accessory Item and Shadow Blast on the user's Active List.
